description: Farrington Park by Polygon in neighbourhood of Burke Mountain. Bright 3-bedroom end unit townhome with a functional open layout. Featuring laminate wood flooring, new carpet, most appliances replaced in 2021, plus a gourmet kitchen with granite counters, flat-panel cabinets & stainless steel appliances. South-facing exposure brings natural light all year. Steps to Galloway Park with playground, splash pad & sports court. Walk to Smiling Creek Elementary, trails & shopping at Meridian Crossing. Minutes to Coquitlam Centre, SkyTrain & all amenities.
